mapper.select: select t_shop.commodity_id,t_commodity.commodity_code, t_commodity.commodity_first_picture as pictureAddress, t_commodity.commodity_name,t_commodity.commodity_retail_price, t_shop.shop_number as 'commodity_num',t_shop.shop_id from t_shop,t_commodity where t_shop.customer_id=#{customerId} and t_shop.is_deleted=0 and t_commodity.commodity_id=t_shop.commodity_id and t_commodity.is_deleted=0
mapper.update: update t_shop set is_deleted = 1 where shop_id=#{shopId} and is_deleted=0
